Articles.Content:
I've started writing a series of immersive news-stylized posts in response to everything I do in Kerbal Space Program. This will cover missions, design tests and attempts and of course, my cases of rapid unplanned disassembly. Please let me know what you think as I consider all feedback I receive to be the voice of the taxpayers and the taxpayers get what the taxpayers want!

Recent posts:

Intro to Rapid Unplanned Disassembly

Duna Express Arrives at Duna

Eve Express Launches

Edited August 17, 2013 by Yuka
This just in: Duna Rover Lands Hard
The next step of exploration for RUD begins as the Eve Express arrives at its destination.
Keep going, perhaps some cool formatting, to look 60's could improve it.

RUD launches the beginning of a space station to support interplanetary mining of kethane: Grissom Station Core Launched

Keep going, perhaps some cool formatting, to look 60's could improve it.

Thanks. I've been practicing different writing styles which you will see if you browse the website and read other works I have done. This work has an amazing effect if you can read it in the

. Any recommendations to get a 60's formatting/tone/diction? Edited August 12, 2013 by Yuka
RUD Testing Kethane Drilling Platform
Ogun-1 to Survey Mun for Ore

An aside from the usual writing, after a hiatus of writing... I wrote this article on my method of exploring celestial bodies and gathering scientific data: http://thelonegamers.com/gathering-science-in-kerbal-space-program/

I have restarted RUD, due mostly to a broken save game file after 0.23 released. I've also been doing a lot of live streaming @ http://twitch.tv/yukanojo
